definitions: characterize (a quality or trait) as fundamental or intrinsic to a particular type of person or thing

examples.text: this approach is controversial because it could essentialize the ‘peaceful’ nature of women

shortDefinitions: characterize quality or trait as intrinsic to particular type of person or thing

definitions: portray or explain (a particular type of person or thing) in terms of one or more stereotypical or supposedly intrinsic traits

examples.text: nineties culture, over time, has been essentialized into a few symbols

shortDefinitions: portray or explain in terms of stereotypical traits
